title: dhayalEni brathukEmi
sahitya:
dayalEni bratukEmi dasharatha rAma nI



anupallavi



vayasu nUraina nI vasudha nElina gAni



caraNam



rAjAjadhirAja ratirAja shata lAvaNya pUja japamula vELa

pondugA neduTa rAjilla

    lOkAntaranga marmamu delipi rAjisEyani tyAgarAja sannuta nIdu
